sys_hub_flow.description: Scheduled flow to check for overdue NeedIt Tasks, close the overdue tasks, update the work notes for the task with a reason, and log the automatic closure.

sys_hub_flow.name: Overdue NeedIt Task Cleaner

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Looks up the application property autoCloseOverdue

sys_element_mapping.value: NeedIt Task {{573ce8c2-cffa-444b-87d7-013969fe644d.item.number}}was automatically closed because its Due date of {{573ce8c2-cffa-444b-87d7-013969fe644d.item.due_date}}was older than the autoCloseOverdue setting of {{2ba617e4-3924-4a7b-9a43-531b7800db46.property_value}}days.

NeedIt Task {{573ce8c2-cffa-444b-87d7-013969fe644d.item.number}}was automatically closed because its Due date of {{573ce8c2-cffa-444b-87d7-013969fe644d.item.due_date}}was older than the autoCloseOverdue setting of {{2ba617e4-3924-4a7b-9a43-531b7800db46.property_value}}days.

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Calculate the limit date to know if a task is overdue.
Look for all the NeedIt Task that were due past the calculated date.
Looks up the application property autoCloseOverdue
